DESCRIPTION: Coverings worn by soldiers to protect the body in battle.
Bleeding creatures take damage at the start of their turn and whenever they attack. Stacks are reduced by #b1 at the end of the turn.
Burned creatures take damage at the start of the turn. Flames are extinguished after 3 turns unless reapplied.
Deal and receive 50% damage.
Damage scales +1x with Dexterity and -1x with Strength.
Subsequent flurry cards deal more damage.
Decrease attack damage by #b1 per stack. Stack is reduced by #b1 at the end of turn. NL Targets with 5 or more stacks are also slowed.
Doesn't scale with Dexterity.
Upon reaching 10 stacks of Lightning, the target is stunned. NL Each time a target is stunned, it requires 5 more stacks of Lightning to stun them again.
Scales with up to 3 Dexterity.
Armor scales fully with Dexterity.
Subsequent Paired weapons deal bonus damage.
A unique power. Only one Prestige Class can be active at a time.
Damage ignores Block, Curl Up, Sharp Hide, Malleable, and Thorns.
Completely blocking Attack damage reflects it back at the attacker. Reduces by 1 at the start of your turn.
Spells require focus to play, and scale with focus. They are unaffected by physical powers. Cannot be cast while in Wrath.
Gain additional block the next time you block.
Stealth is a power that grants Block equal to your Dexterity at end of turn. NL It is used as a requirement for various Rogue cards.
Damage scales +1x with Strength.
A thing designed for inflicting bodily harm or physical damage.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
